paragraphs: =madrileño=, _m._, Madrilene, native of Madrid, inhabitant of Madrid.

=maldito, ta=, _adj._, cursed, damned; =maldita la falta que me hacían=, =52=, 13, damned little need I had; =maldita aquella=, =68=, 19, devil a bit; =maldita seas=, =67=, 13, damn you, be damned to you; _etc._
=malo, la=, _adj._ (=mal=), bad, poor, ill; wicked, evil; =ponerse --=, =82=, 24, to fall ill; =lo --=, =117=, 7, the evil, the ill.
=mandar=, _v. a._, to send; to order; to command.

=mano=, _f._, hand; =--s a la obra=, to work!; =de --s a boca=, =49=, 7, =77=, 21, suddenly, unawares; =venir con sus --s lavadas=, to come with improper proposals or intentions, =119=, 15; =echar -- a=, =91=, 3, to seize; =de --s de=, =42=, 25, from the hands of.
=mantener=, _v. a._, to maintain, to keep up.
=mañana=, _adv._, to-morrow; =-- por la --=, =66=, 2, =84=, 21, early to-morrow morning.
=marchar=, _v. a._, to go; to go along; _v. refl._, =--se=, to leave, to go away.
=María Luisa=, _f. npr._, Maria Louisa, _see note to_ =16=, 1.
=marras=, _adv._, formerly, recently; =de --=, =109=, 15, well known, hereinbefore described.

=más=, _adv._, more; =el, la --=, the most; =83=, 12, except, but; =32=, 4, other, more than; =-- que=, except; =por -- que=, however much, although; =--bien=, =104=, 20, rather; =27=, 7, more, further.
=mayor=, _adj._, greater, larger; older; =caza --=, =91=, 8, big game; =el, la --=, the greatest, largest.
=mayúsculo, la=, _adj._, capital, large (_of letters_); _see note to_ =91=, 9.
=mecer=, _v. a._, to rock, to swing; _v. refl._, =--se=, =39=, 3, to rock.
=mediar=, _v. a._, to halve, to take half, =63=, 16; _pp._, =mediado, da=, =62=, 8, half done, half over.
=medio, día=, _adj._, half; =a media voz=, =34=, 2, in a low voice.
=medio=, _m._, midst, middle; means; =de en --=, =61=, 5, out of the way; =por -- de=, by means of.
=mejor=, _adv._, better, best; =por -- decir=, =45=, 22, to speak more accurately.
=mencionar=, _v. a._, to mention, _pp._, =mencionado, da=, said, mentioned, aforesaid.
=menor=, _adj._, less; younger; smaller; =el, la --=, the least, youngest, _etc._; =--es=, =15=, 10, minor orders, _see note_.

=menos=, _adv._, less; =echar de --=, =91=, 23, _see_ =echar=; =lo --=, =50=, 27, at the least; =a lo --=, =cuando --=, at least; =ni mucho --=, =108=, 23, nor much less, not by any means, far from it; =-- nosotros=, =121=, 21, except ourselves.
=mente=, _f._, mind; =estar allí en la -- divina=, =45=, 15, to be in the bosom of the gods, on the knees of the gods.
=merced=, _f._, grace, mercy; =-- a=, =10=, 16, thanks to; =su --=, =55=, 15, his worship.
=merecer=, _v. a._, to deserve, to merit; to earn, to gain.

=meter=, _v. a._, to place, to put; =metió los talones=, =65=, 15, kicked, spurred; =alguaciles metidos a alcahuetes=, =68=, 2, constables turned procurers; =-- el montante=, _cf._ =montante=; =--se=, _v. refl._, to interfere; to meddle; to mingle with; to thrust oneself in; =meterse en harina=, =4=, 17, to set to work, to get to work.
=miedo=, _m._, fear; =dar --=, =25=, 11, to frighten; =tener --=, =88=, 8, to be afraid.
=mil=, _adj. num._, thousand; a thousand, one thousand.
=milsietecientos ochenta y nueve=, _adj. num._, seventeen eighty-nine.
=mimar=, _v. a._, to caress, to pamper, to spoil, =19=, 4.
=mío=, =mía=, _adj. poss._, my, mine; =el mío=, =la mía=, _pron. poss._, mine.

=mirar=, _v. a._, to look at; _v. n._, to look; =mira=, =29=, 5, =30=, 16, =35=, 10, =113=, 14, see here, look here; =52=, 19, =52=, 29, there's; =¡mira lo que no sé!= =31=, 24, there's something I don't know; =¡miren el vanidoso!= =31=, 16, just see the vain creature, will you look at the vain thing.

=mismo, ma=, _adj._, same, the same; self (_used in connection with the personal pronouns_); =lo --=, the same thing, =40=, 24; =lo -- que=, as well as, the same as, just as, like; =por lo -- que=, =125=, 15, just because, for the very reason that. [p. 214]
=modo=, _m._, way, manner, mode; =de -- que=, =39=, 9, so that; =de otro --=, =102=, 12, otherwise.
=molde=, _m._, mould, matrix; =en letras de --=, =3=, 17, in print.
=molinero=, miller; _pl._, =--s=, the miller and his wife, =42=, 9.
=mona=, _f._, she-ape, she monkey, =31=, 2; =durmiendo la --=, =87=, 1, sleeping off his drink.
=montante=, _m._, broadsword; =meter el --=, =109=, 14, to interfere, to interpose; (_said of one who interposes his sword between two combatants_).
=montar=, _v. a._, to ride, =86=, 16; _v. n._, to mount, to get up, =96=, 22.
